messages.message:
Hi all, PSA - I've re-written/cleaned-up a bunch of our engineering onboarding docs and also moved into Confluence from Google Drive. The old docs have been deleted in case you go looking for them.

Notable page updates:
1. Main onboarding page (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ENG/pages/2874966103/Onboarding) - list of things you should do/read in order when onboarding
2. *Setting you your dev environment (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ENG/pages/2881486881/Setting+up+your+Dev+Environment) - Update your bookmarks!*
3. Developer Guide (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ENG/pages/2875850753/Developer+Guide) - Consolidated information from a few separate docs about writing code in each language, style guides, linters, code structure, etc
4. Github guide (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ENG/pages/1819443258/Github+Guide) - How we use Github
5. Jira guide (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ENG/pages/2033319972/Jira+Guide) - Still pending some new updates about how we should be using Jira across EPD
6. Testing guide (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ENG/pages/128614569/Testing) - All the tests we run here
7. Unit testing guide (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ENG/pages/2874998834/Unit+Tests) - Specific make commands to help with local development
8. IB Envs (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ENG/pages/1037172794/Instabase+Environments) - Description of all our environments
